name: Succubus Cafe
description:
About the GameThere are three girls at Succubus Café: Lilith, Eisheth, and Alice.
The cafe only opens at night and customers are served by the girls.
The girls provide customers with a wonderful experience. You can choose a girl to serve you.
The girl's outfit including clothing, hair decoration, accessories and make-up can be customized in advance.
You can also select another girl to 3P with. Different motions are available for each position. Props can be used for interactions with the girls as well.
This game retains the Dirty Talk system and Cutaway View of its predecessor.
Dirty Talk system:
Audio includes primary (auxiliary) voice channels. When Dirty Talk is enabled, all other sound effects become muted. When Dirty Talk is disabled, all other sounds revert to normal so that the player can concentrate on one sound at a time.
Cutaway View:
In this game, cutaway view is now show in 3D and includes internal ejaculation effects.
Audio Language:
English and Japanese audio supported. This includes all moaning, dirty talk and conversations.
Subtitles:
Supports English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese.
Characters:
Once a succubus reaches 18 years of age… She will always look 18. All three girls are therefore adults.
Game audio is available in English and Japanese. Subtitles and user interface can be in English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, or Simplified Chinese.
